tier_4_procedural.case_title: Aakash Ramchandra Chavan vs. The State of Maharashtra
tier_4_procedural.court_name: High Court of Judicature at Bombay
tier_4_procedural.sections_invoked: Section 394 read with Section 397 of the Indian Penal Code

residual_details.additional_facts: The appellant was convicted alongside co-accused Rais @ Jamil Bashir Shaikh. The incident involved the assault and attempted robbery of Vijay Sadavate and his companion Mansoor. A Test Identification Parade confirmed the identity of the appellant.
